snippet.title: Disney Frozen Adventures Game | ALL NEW MOBILE GAME | Official Launch Trailer - 11/14/19
snippet.description:
Disney's World of Frozen comes to life in an exciting ALL NEW mobile match 3 puzzle adventure. Join Elsa, Anna and Olaf as you build and renovate the Kingdom in a brand new mobile game based on Disney’s Frozen & Frozen 2 movies. Design and decorate the Kingdom of Arendelle and beyond!
 
Explore and embark on an all-new Frozen adventure that takes you to new and familiar locations around Arendelle and the entire Frozen world. Play hundreds of match-3 games and earn snowflakes to decorate the castle and make it look amazing!

❄️❄️Disney Frozen Adventures is available NOW to download for FREE on Google Play and App Store ❄️❄️
 
KEY FEATURES:
EXPLORE THE FROZEN WORLD: Explore new and familiar locations in Arendelle and beyond.
 
PLAY EXCITING MATCH 3 PUZZLES: Play hundreds of levels match three puzzles.
 
CUSTOMIZE THE KINGDOM: Earn snowflakes to decorate the castle to make it beautiful.
 
EMBARK ON AN ALL NEW FROZEN ADVENTURE: Continue the Frozen story beyond the films.
 
PLAY ALONG WITH FROZEN CHARACTERS: Play and interact with Anna, Elsa, Olaf, and more!
 
ALWAYS SOMETHING NEW: Ongoing events to keep the action exciting and unlock special in-game prizes.
 
Includes in-app purchases.

❄️❄️CONNECT WITH US!❄️❄️
Subscribe to Frozen Adventures: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPJMr7vdBRjTwrSvOkHOC3A
Like our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/frozenadventuresgame/
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/frozenadventuresgame/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/frozenadvgame
